name: es9018k2m
description: Hardware control for ES9018K2M DAC via I2C with automatic volume synchronization
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Hardware control for ES9018K2M DAC via I2C. Software or Hardware volume modes (Hardware enables volume slider with Mixer Type: None), safe startup volume, start muted option, remember last volume, graceful volume ramping, digital filters (FIR/IIR), DPLL jitter reduction, and balance control. Works with any ES9018K2M-based DAC HAT using the standard i2s-dac overlay.
volumio_info.changelog: v1.2.3 - Fixed startup volume timing with VOLUMIO_SYSTEM_STATUS polling, added config.save() for reliable volume persistence, startMuted now respects rememberLastVolume for slider position, dynamic UI with visibleIf
